collection.name: Judgement of Shamash
collection.openText: I made a promise to her, to everyone, that no matter what the cost, humanity would triumph over the Collapse!

observe.desc: [ {It has a black and white barrel, while the Ruler's core is crimson. The core has a safety mechanism in place. To limit its power, the core of the Ruler was split into two pieces and placed in the twin guns. It isn't very powerful, as this mechanism caused the twin gun barrels to stretch and morph to form the hilts of the sword, and a hot flame, like molten gold, rises up to the sky and coalesces into the sword's body.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: This Abnormality contains great power. It can be wielded by employees.
It causes those who use it to lose HP in order to deal exponentially increased damage.
When it is used twice by the same employee in a single day, they will die a strange and unprescedented death.
